column1: Today is a new day for our country. I feel such relief and jubilation. It’s been 4 exhausting years but now it’s finally over. Together we will move forward under the leadership of @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris who will work to heal our divisions and unite us once again.
Nevada voters - please stay in line and make sure your voices are heard! #ElectionDay2020 https://t.co/q7Wb6IMXVu

I pledge to stand with the caregivers of @SEIU2015! We need a White House that supports our #caregivers & recognizes just how essential they are. Time to invest in #LongTermCare➡️Join me & sign the pledge: https://t.co/tpu43LBNzR #OurVoteIsEssential #Congress4Caregivers https://t.co/byzHZgddxs
Join @KamalaHarris and me tomorrow at 4pm PDT/ 7pm EDT for a fundraiser supporting @BidenHarris2020.  The election will be over in 11 days. It's now or never!    https://t.co/ekGyZ41CmT
Loved joining this group to talk about how we CAN and WILL win this fight! #AAPIsforBiden https://t.co/eAPPngINW6
I'm sorry @realDonaldTrump the Affordable Care Act doesn't cover lies and deceit. Joe clearly won this debate #TeamJoe #Debates2020 https://t.co/lWea6jzXLY

Biden points out that 525 children  can’t find their parents due to Trump’s family separation policy. Trump’s response? “Good!” The character of our country is on the ballot right now. #BidenHarris2020 #Debates2020
Mr. President the Heroes Act has been sitting at Mitch McConnell's desk since May 15. Tell the Republicans to help the American people and pass the #HeroesAct NOW! #PresidentialDebate2020
In case anyone has forgotten Trump and Republicans have NO plan to protect people with pre-existing conditions. And they’ve had FOUR years to do it. #PresidentialDebate2020
I'm so tired of Trump's "greatest hits" of lies and deceit.  #ReleaseYourTaxReturns #PresidentialDebate2020
.@realDonaldTrump your Treasury Secretary is literally Wall Street #PresidentialDebate2020

I joined my good friend @Grace4NY to lay out exactly what's on the line in this presidential election. Joe & Kamala are counting on us to use the power of our vote to get them to the White House. Read it here▶️https://t.co/ZWooKWDPUU #AAPIsforBiden
Thank you @rweingarten! Proud to be in this fight with you. #AFTVotes https://t.co/rKtSe13YGw

When I was younger I didn't see many faces like mine on TV. Until I turned on the evening news and saw Connie Chung at the anchor desk. She was a hero of mine & now she is stepping out with a message: Voting is our right and our duty. #BidenHarris2020 https://t.co/o7kQx52B7D

I'm so proud to be endorsed by @NewtownAction.  I am committed to pushing for common sense legislation that will end the epidemic of gun violence in our country to keep our children safer. #VoteGunSafety2020 #EndGunViolence https://t.co/QtgzgN5YxX

#MyNameIs 趙美心 or Zhao-Mei-Shin. It means 'beautiful heart' in Mandarin. My grandparents risked it all & came here to offer their kids a better life. Now their grandchild is the 1st Chinese American Congresswoman. #IWillVote bc Joe & Kamala know our diversity is our strength.

Today is your last chance to be counted!  Go to https://t.co/mNNl4xw5oq to respond to the census. Make sure you your friends and family get the resources and representation you deserve. It only takes a few minutes and the results last a decade.

Voting is so easy and convenient! I sent in my mail-in ballot & signed up for "Where's my Ballot" with @CASOSvote. They just emailed me to confirm that my ballot was received and counted. With one million CA ballots already cast there's NO excuse to sit this one out. #VoteSafeCA https://t.co/6wvt4XcV9I

In the 12 hours after President Trump announced he tested positive for COVID-19 a surge of anti-Asian sentiment and conspiracy theories proliferated on Twitter.  Here is my interview on KCRW about what can be done. https://t.co/UCXedZ6Jcy

AAPIs have been hit hard by the #COVID19 pandemic. Meanwhile Donald Trump continues to spew racist anti-Asian hate calling the coronavirus the 'China Virus'. I want a POTUS who cares about our communities. I'm with @JoeBiden #StandTogether #AAPIsforBiden https://t.co/sv9HilnX17
Thrilled to join this amazing line-up tonight to get out the vote for  #BidenHarris and TX Dems! We’re working hard to #TurnTexasBlue #AAPISforBiden https://t.co/4nNssXy1hU

Tonight I will be cheering on California’s very own Senator @KamalaHarris. She has made me proud on so many levels. And right now she is breaking another barrier becoming the first AAPI in history to compete in a general election debate. #AAPISforBidenHarris

@DCCC understands what's at stake in CA's 39th dist congressional race and how vital  AAPI voters are. @GilCisnerosCA will fight to save healthcare for all Californians. #votedem https://t.co/oMOvvSoX6O
Well folks elect a clown expect a circus.  Our country cannot afford  four more years of lies and humiliation. #ShowUpandVote #BidenHarris2020
When asked why the American people should vote for them Trump talked about himself. Joe talked about families like you. #PresidentialDebate
You paid millions of dollars in federal income taxes Mr. President? Prove it. #ReleaseYourTaxReturns #PresidentialDebates
No matter how much Donald Trump babbles he has no plan to replace the ACA. #JustShutUpMan #PresidentialDebate2020

America’s most diverse generation of small business leaders is on the rise. Proud to join @JoeBiden and @KamalaHarris to launch our Small Business Advisory Council. Together we will organize communities across America to build back better! https://t.co/Qst2cuhfUH #SmallBiz4Biden
The way we treat animals as individuals and as a nation is a measure of our decency. I appreciate the endorsement of Animal Wellness Action and their work to protect animals. #animalwellnessaction

Join me TODAY at 3 PM PST/6 PM ET for an Asian American and Pacific Islander Small Business Roundtable with Rep. Grace Meng and Rep. Dwight Evans. We'll be discussing the importance of AAPI small businesses in their local communities. Register here! https://t.co/2glBbz9I0G

Today is National Voter Registration Day! It is vital that everyone knows how to safely and securely vote on or before Nov. 3rd.  Make sure you your family and friends have a plan to vote.  Go to https://t.co/wH5uVIEqRW for information in your state.#NationalVoterRegistrationDay
Join me @Alyssa_Milano Reps. @MaxineWaters and others for an exciting game night to kick off our 2020 campaigns! Register today: https://t.co/S6MZmkEwXv https://t.co/7SUmPNhtjm
I am devastated to hear of the passing of Justice Ginsberg.  This is a huge loss to our country. We must continue her fight for equality and justice for all. #RIPRBG https://t.co/IMjkie5fh6
Thank you for the support @NationalNurses! https://t.co/qeEfRrzA6C

.@JoeBiden showed tonight that he is the only candidate that cares about all of us especially the families of the 170000 that have lost their lives due to this country's failed response to COVID-19.  We can be united toward a better America and Joe will lead the way. #DNC

No plans before the #DNC tonight? No problem! Join me @MichelleWKwan @kalpenn @Grace4NY and @kevinkwanbooks  for the @AAPI_Biden Pre-Convention Watch Party tonight at 8:30 PM ET/ 5:30 PM PT. Register here: https://t.co/XNwHdp83x9

History was made tonight. We have our team in @KamalaHarris and @JoeBiden.  It’s time for us to get to work turn out the vote and WIN in November. With them we’ll restore empathy dignity and leadership to the White House #DNC2020

Thank you @BarackObama for your powerful warning about what is at stake right now. You’ve felt the weight of responsibility of the Oval Office & know what terrible harm can be done if its occupant doesn’t care about the American people. We must vote for change on Nov 3. #DNC2020

I fell in love with @DrBiden tonight perhaps because like me she was a dedicated community college teacher. But mainly she was the glue that helped the Bidens heal after incredible personal loss.  America needs her empathy & strength after losing 170k lives to COVID19 #DNC2020
The beauty of this virtual roll call is that the diversity of our country is on full display.  America’s strength lies in our differences 🇺🇸 #DemConvention #DNC
Join me at the #demconvention tomorrow. The AAPI Caucus will focus on moving forward together towards a brighter future! https://t.co/7v1zfE9qY9

It is what it is @michelleobama gave a powerful speech last night at the #demconvention. I agree that "Donald Trump is the wrong president for our country". We must do all we can to change the downward spiral we are in and elect #BidenHarris!
Loved joining the DNC #AAPICaucus yesterday. It’s time to restore empathy and leadership to the White House.  #DNC2020 #AAPISforBiden https://t.co/h5bkndUOkH
I'm thrilled to be part of the 2020 Democratic Convention. Join me tomorrow at 11am PT for a panel discussion on "Diversity and the Face of Small Business". https://t.co/zPH5vdLeDd

Last year @KamalaHarris visited my Congressional district to discuss the importance of taking care of our #immigrantcommunities. I'm so excited to work with her once she's elected #VicePresident to ensure that America remains the beacon of hope for those yearning to breath free! https://t.co/JPdBPuP9ZD

This is historic. Today @JoeBiden announces @KamalaHarris as his VP the first Asian American and first Black woman to be nominated for a major party ticket. Kamala is a proven leader and fighter for the little guy. We need #BidenHarris in the White House. let's get to work!

@JoeBiden understands that racial inequities are a systemic problem. That's why he's introduced a plan to create an economy where Black Latino AAPI and Native American workers and families are finally welcomed as full participants. #BuildBackBetter https://t.co/IUhK409o3h

Our nurses deserve the resources they need to care for us and keep themselves safe during #COVID19. That’s why I stand with the nurses of @SEIU121RN as they strike for a safer work environment. #SupportHealthcareHeroes  https://t.co/hHdoAVM8ru

This decision is a great victory for our #Dreamers! But our fight isn't over. I'll be going to bat for Democrats in the Senate and White House so that we can finally act on true comprehensive immigration reform with a pathway to citizenship for Dreamers. #SCOTUS #DACA
#glasshouses #stones  https://t.co/ty0UeLRMi5
to bring about real and lasting change. #blacklivesmatter #georgefloyd #strongertogether  https://t.co/jhEdAQYOWz

I stand with our sisters and brothers in the black community in condemning police brutality and justice for all who have been murdered and tormented because of the color of their skin. We will continue to fight against systemic racism and use this moment in history..

I’m supporting @JoeBiden because we need a uniter in the White House. Not a man that uses tragedy and injustice as an opportunity to stoke the flames of racism and incite violence against Americans who are grieving. #AAPISforBiden

We know that people of color are dying at higher rates from #COVID19. But with this joke of a report the Trump administration is either not willing or not capable of giving us the tools we need to support those that are hurting the most. https://t.co/BGrMVJsMYH

Trump failed to act in time and now nearly 100000 people are dead from #COVID19. But instead of taking responsibility he's doing what he always does: stoking xenophobia. @JoeBiden & @TammyforIL are right. His words cause real harm and he doesn't care.   https://t.co/MQuhWPZcYf
I was glad to be a part of to be a part of this town hall with nbc news. https://t.co/tOtdbBaodK

Immigrant workers are disproportionately on the front lines but they've been left out of #COVID19 relief. I'm grateful to @APIAVote @votolatino & @MAFpajarito for launching https://t.co/FKSBtg3Ktx - with a $1M investment from @EastWestBank - to get immigrant families help now.

“One of the first things we knew we had to do was to educate our own colleagues in the House and the Senate because I felt that they were not aware of how extensive the [anti-Asian] hate crimes and incidents have gotten.” https://t.co/VuAhwnC6Na

Trump’s latest ad against Biden only serves to stoke bigotry against Asian Americans. Gary Locke is an American patriot and role model for so many. This ad is a sad attempt to distract the nation from Trump’s own failed leadership through this crisis.   https://t.co/DPlv78ERi5
@ChristyforCA25 is running for Congress to provide leadership in these challenging times. But she can’t do it without your help! Donate here today: https://t.co/XxuuwG4iDN https://t.co/F72jy6e8Bv
